<center> 

[SmallWeb](https://smallweb.net "SmallWeb") provides shared, reseller and email hosting using the DirectAdmin control panel. 

</center>

>You can still get 50% off our 1GB Singapore plan with the code "HALF". [Simply click here](https://smallweb.net/portal/order/config/index/limited/?group_id=35&pricing_id=758 "Simply click here").

---


**SmallWeb offers shared hosting in 8 locations.**

* Amsterdam, Netherlands (EPYC, SSD)
* Germany, Europe (Ryzen, NVMe)
* Los Angeles, United States (Ryzen, NVMe)
* Luxembourg, Europe (Intel, SSD)
* London, United Kingdom (Intel, SSD)
* Melbourne, Australia (Intel, NVMe)
* New York, United States (Intel, SSD)
* Singapore, Asia (Intel, NVMe)

---
